header.title: About English Academy
header.subtitle: Discover our passion for teaching and commitment to your success

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: At English Academy, we believe that language learning should be accessible, engaging, and effective. Our mission is to empower learners worldwide with the tools and confidence they need to master the English language.
mission.vision: We envision a world where language barriers don't limit opportunities, and every learner has access to high-quality English education that opens doors to global communication and success.

communicative.title: Communicative Approach
communicative.description: Focus on real-world communication skills through interactive exercises and practical scenarios.

progressive.title: Progressive Learning
progressive.description: Structured curriculum that builds from basic to advanced concepts systematically.

personalized.title: Personalized Learning
personalized.description: Adaptive content that adjusts to your learning pace and individual needs.

sarah.name: Dr. Sarah Johnson
sarah.title: Lead Instructor
sarah.bio: PhD in Applied Linguistics with 15 years of teaching experience across different cultures.

michael.name: Michael Chen
michael.title: Conversation Specialist
michael.bio: Native speaker specializing in pronunciation and conversational English for business professionals.

emma.name: Emma Williams
emma.title: Grammar Expert
emma.bio: Master's in English Education with expertise in making complex grammar concepts simple and fun.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: We maintain the highest standards in course content, instruction, and student support.

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.description: Quality education should be available to everyone, regardless of location or background.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We continuously evolve our teaching methods using the latest educational technology.

community.title: Community
community.description: Building a supportive learning environment where students help each other succeed.

header.title: Our English Courses
header.subtitle: Choose the perfect course to match your learning goals and current level

beginner.title: English Foundations
beginner.description: Perfect for complete beginners. Learn basic vocabulary, pronunciation, and essential grammar to start your English journey.

intermediate.title: English Expansion
intermediate.description: Build upon your basic knowledge with complex grammar, expanded vocabulary, and real-world communication skills.

advanced.title: English Mastery
advanced.description: Achieve fluency with advanced topics, nuanced expressions, and professional communication skills.

business.title: Business English
business.description: Professional English for the workplace. Master business communication, presentations, and industry-specific vocabulary.

conversation.title: Conversation Practice
conversation.description: Improve your speaking confidence through guided conversations, role-plays, and interactive speaking exercises.

ielts.title: IELTS Preparation
ielts.description: Comprehensive IELTS test preparation covering all four skills: Reading, Writing, Listening, and Speaking.

materials.title: Course Materials
materials.description: Comprehensive study materials, worksheets, and downloadable resources.

support.title: Personal Support
support.description: One-on-one guidance from certified instructors throughout your journey.

certificate.title: Certificate
certificate.description: Earn a verified certificate upon successful completion of your course.

access.title: Lifetime Access

support.title: Need Immediate Help?
support.description: Check our FAQ section or use our live chat feature during business hours for instant assistance.

enrollment.question: How do I enroll in a course?
enrollment.answer: You can enroll in any of our courses by visiting the Courses page, selecting your desired course, and clicking the "Enroll Now" button. You'll be guided through a simple registration and payment process.

requirements.question: What are the technical requirements?
requirements.answer: Our courses work on any device with an internet connection. We recommend using a modern web browser (Chrome, Firefox, Safari, or Edge) and having a stable internet connection for the best learning experience.

refund.question: What is your refund policy?
refund.answer: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee. If you're not satisfied with your course within the first 30 days, contact us for a full refund. No questions asked.

certificate.question: Do I get a certificate upon completion?
certificate.answer: Yes! Upon successful completion of any course, you'll receive a verified digital certificate that you can download and share on professional networks like LinkedIn.

footer.description: Empowering learners worldwide with quality English education.
